cvmx_rng_iobdma_data_t Union Reference

Structure describing the data format used for IOBDMA stores to the RNG. More...

#include <cvmx-rng.h>

Data Fields

uint64_t u64
struct {
   uint64_t   scraddr:8
 the (64-bit word) location in scratchpad to write to (if len != 0)
   uint64_t   len:8
 the number of words in the response (0 => no response)
   uint64_t   did:5
 the ID of the device on the non-coherent bus
   uint64_t   subdid:3
 the sub ID of the device on the non-coherent bus
   uint64_t   addr:40
 the address that will appear in the first tick on the NCB bus
} s

Detailed Description

Structure describing the data format used for IOBDMA stores to the RNG.
